jdbcService.sql: select mde.id, mde.created, mde.modified, mde.name, mde.owner_id, mde.description, mde.master_data_category_id from ~master_data_entries mde join ~master_data_categories mdc on mde.master_data_category_id = mdc.id where mdc.id = :categoryId and ((:ownerId is null and mde.owner_id is null) or mde.owner_id = :ownerId) order by mde.name
